name: Escape Kowaii Killer Game
description:
The character Zeruel who woke up from a state of unconsciousness in a pitch of dark creepy room asks assistance to you to guide her to escape from the locked room.  But can she be escaped from Kowaii Killer ? With the right guidance and hints, help Zeruel to reveal the path of escape.   However, it is not going to be that easy no matter how much you try the Kowaii Killer won't spare anyone.  Reveal the hidden truth and find out the killer.

A game made by Athira Bhargavan (Artesmet)
